graph_title: Children with disabilities living in orphanages (aged 0-17 years) at the end of the year
indicator_name: Children with disabilities living in orphanages (aged 0-17 years) at the end of the year
national_indicator_description: Disabled children living in orphanages (0-17 years old), at the end of the year is the number of disabled children living in orphanages (0-17 years old) at the end of the year and the share of disabled children living in orphanages from 0-17 years old population
computation_definitions: Social service organizations for the elderly and disabled and orphanages are medical and social institutions intended for the permanent residence, household and medical care for the adults in need of care, the disabled and children.
computation_calculations: Number of children with disabilities living in orphanages and their ratio to children with disabilities.
